title: 265-Monkey King: Out of Your Gourd
itunes:title: 265-Monkey King: Out of Your Gourd
description:
A super-powered monkey from Chinese folklore meets more than he bargained for: a sloshing hollow gourd full of pus.

The creature is the Mikaribaba (箕借り婆) from Japanese folklore, a great reason not to shower (because she will literally gouge out your eyes).

--

Scoundrel! New episode of Scoundrel this week. Check it out: https://myths.link/scoundrel

New episodes of Best of the Worst out, too. They're a lot of fun. https://myths.link/botw
